name: kuvasz
tagline: An uptime monitoring and incident alerting service for infrastructure
description: Kuvasz is an uptime monitoring and incident notification service. It regularly checks endpoints, records availability metrics and sends alerts when services go down, providing a central dashboard for small to medium infrastructures.

features.title: Uptime Monitoring
features.description: Monitor availability of websites and services

features.title: Health Checks
features.description: Perform periodic checks on defined endpoints

features.title: Notification Rules
features.description: Send alerts when services become unavailable

features.title: Dashboard View
features.description: View monitoring results in a web interface

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the monitoring service on your own servers
